title: Nexus 6P
summary: Nexus 6P (codenamed Angler[6]) is an Android smartphone developed and marketed by Google and manufactured by Huawei. It succeeded the Nexus 6 as the flagship device of the Nexus line of Android devices by Google. Officially unveiled on 29 September 2015 along with the Nexus 5X at the Google Nexus 2015 press event held in San Francisco,[7] it was made available for pre-order on the same day in United States, United Kingdom, Ireland, and Japan.
